title: Starship For Sale
description: When Ben Murdock receives a text message offering a fully operational starship for sale, he’s certain it has to be a joke.Already trapped in the worst day of his life and desperate for a way out, he decides to play along. Except there is no joke. The starship is real. And Ben’s life is going to change in ways he never dreamed possible.All he has to do is sign the contract.Joined by his streetwise best friend and a bizarre tenant with an unseverable lease, he’ll soon discover that the universe is more volatile, treacherous, and awesome than he ever imagined.And the only thing harder than owning a starship is staying alive.
author: M.R. Forbes
